div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم حير الــفع
حفظك اللّه وأطال في الخير بقاك إنّي وجدت أصل به فكان مسحت على اسم بن عفيف
وسويرس جملة فلم أحب أن أنسبها إلى المسلمين ولا إلى الفبط لأنّما مسحت عليهما كثيرا
فهل تحب أمتعا اللّه بك أناعطها أقسمها بينهما على ما أنصفت استقبلت كل واحد منهما
فأعلمني رأيك فيها حفظك اللّه وأطال بقاك وكتب

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi ḥyr ăl ***fʿ
ḥafiẓa ka ăl lāhu wa ʾaṭāla fī ăl ḫayri baqāʾa ka ʾin nī waǧadtu ʾaṣl bi hi fa kāna musiḥat ʿalà ĭsmi bni ʿafīf:in
wa sawīrusa ǧumlaẗ:an fa lam ʾuḥibb ʾan ʾansiba hā ʾilà ăl muslimīna wa lā ʾilà ăl qibṭi liʾanna mā masaḥtu ʿalay himā kaṯīr:an
fa hal tuḥibbu ʾamtaʿa ăl lāhu bi ka ʾan ʾaqsima hā bayna humā ʿalà mā ʾanṣaftu ĭstaqbaltu kulla wāḥid:in min humā
fa ʾaʿlim nī raʾya ka fī hā ḥafiẓa ka ăl lāhu wa ʾaṭāla baqāʾa ka wa kutiba

In the name of God the Compassionate, the Merciful. (vac.) ... the [...]...
May God preserve you and may He prolong your life in well-being. I found a basic tax assignment/registration in it and it was measured to the debit under the name of Ibn ʿAfīf
and Sawīrus together. Now, I do not want to attribute it to the Muslims nor to the Copts, because I have (already) assessed (lit. measured) much to the debit of both.
Now do you want, may〚a.〛God give joy with you, that I 〚give it〛\divide it/ among the two of them, according to the way I have treated each one of them equally?
Let me know your opinion about this, may God preserve you and may He prolong your life. And it was written.
